languages.text: Every time Pasqal uses his {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Machine Spirit Communion{/g}, the Servoskull Swarm replicates this ability centered on itself.

traits.locale_text: Every time Pasqal uses his {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Machine Spirit Communion{/g}, the Servoskull Swarm replicates this ability centered on itself.

languages.text: Whenever Pasqal uses {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Machine Spirit Communion{/g}, the servo-skull swarm mimics the effect of this ability, creating a second area centred around it. If the areas overlap, the effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Whenever Pasqal uses {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Machine Spirit Communion{/g}, the servo-skull swarm mimics the effect of this ability, becoming a centre of its area. If the areas overlap, the effect does not stack.

Whenever Pasqal uses {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Machine Spirit Communion{/g}, the servo-skull swarm mimics the effect of this ability, creating a second area centred around it. If the areas overlap, the effect does not stack.

Whenever Pasqal uses {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Machine Spirit Communion{/g}, the servo-skull swarm mimics the effect of this ability, creating a second area centred around it. If the areas overlap, the effect does not stack.

languages.text: Cada vez que Pasqal use {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Comunión con espíritu máquina{/g}, el enjambre de servocráneos imita los efectos de esta capacidad creando una segunda zona centrada en él. Si ambas zonas se solapan, sus efectos no se acumulan.
languages.original_text: Whenever Pasqal uses {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Machine Spirit Communion{/g}, the servo-skull swarm mimics the effect of this ability, creating a second area centred around it. If the areas overlap, the effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que Pasqal use {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Comunión con espíritu máquina{/g}, el enjambre de servocráneos imita los efectos de esta capacidad creando una segunda zona centrada en él. Si ambas zonas se solapan, sus efectos no se acumulan.

languages.text: 每当帕斯卡使用{g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}机魂交流{/g}时，伺服头骨集群都会模仿该能力的效果，在其周围创建第二片效果区域。两片区域重叠的部分，效果不会叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever Pasqal uses {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Machine Spirit Communion{/g}, the servo-skull swarm mimics the effect of this ability, creating a second area centred around it. If the areas overlap, the effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 每当帕斯卡使用{g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}机魂交流{/g}时，伺服头骨集群都会模仿该能力的效果，在其周围创建第二片效果区域。两片区域重叠的部分，效果不会叠加。

languages.text: Lorsque Pasqal utilise {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Communication avec l'esprit de la machine{/g}, l'essaim de servocrâne imite les effets de cette capacité en générant une seconde zone autour de lui. Cet effet n'est pas cumulable si les zones se chevauchent.
languages.original_text: Whenever Pasqal uses {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Machine Spirit Communion{/g}, the servo-skull swarm mimics the effect of this ability, creating a second area centred around it. If the areas overlap, the effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque Pasqal utilise {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Communication avec l'esprit de la machine{/g}, l'essaim de servocrâne imite les effets de cette capacité en générant une seconde zone autour de lui. Cet effet n'est pas cumulable si les zones se chevauchent.

languages.text: Pasqal, {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Makine Ruhlarına Hitabet{/g} kullandığında hizmelet sürüsü de bu kabiliyetin etkilerini taklit ederek kendi etrafında ikinci bir alan oluşturur. İki alan çakışırsa etki üst üste birikmez.
languages.original_text: Whenever Pasqal uses {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Machine Spirit Communion{/g}, the servo-skull swarm mimics the effect of this ability, creating a second area centred around it. If the areas overlap, the effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Pasqal, {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Makine Ruhlarına Hitabet{/g} kullandığında hizmelet sürüsü de bu kabiliyetin etkilerini taklit ederek kendi etrafında ikinci bir alan oluşturur. İki alan çakışırsa etki üst üste birikmez.

languages.text: Когда Паскаль применяет {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Связь с машинным духом{/g}, его рой сервочерепов копирует эффект этой способности, создавая еще одну область ее действия вокруг себя. Если области накладываются друг на друга, эффект не суммируется.
languages.original_text: Whenever Pasqal uses {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Machine Spirit Communion{/g}, the servo-skull swarm mimics the effect of this ability, creating a second area centred around it. If the areas overlap, the effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Когда Паскаль применяет {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Связь с машинным духом{/g}, его рой сервочерепов копирует эффект этой способности, создавая еще одну область ее действия вокруг себя. Если области накладываются друг на друга, эффект не суммируется.

Когда Паскаль применяет {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Связь с машинным духом{/g}, его рой сервочерепов копирует эффект этой способности, создавая еще одну область ее действия вокруг себя. Если области накладываются друг на друга, эффект не суммируется.

languages.text: パスカルが{g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}機械精霊グループ{/g} を使用するたび、サーボ・スカル群はこの能力の効果を模倣し、それを中心とした2つ目のエリアを作り出す。領域が重なっている場合、効果はスタックしない。
languages.original_text: Whenever Pasqal uses {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Machine Spirit Communion{/g}, the servo-skull swarm mimics the effect of this ability, creating a second area centred around it. If the areas overlap, the effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Pasqalが{g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Machine Spirit Communion{/g} を使用するたび、サーボ・スカル群はこの能力の効果を模倣し、それを中心とした2つ目のエリアを作り出す。領域が重なっている場合、効果はスタックしない。

languages.text: Setzt Pasqal {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Maschinengeist-Kommunion{/g} ein, imitiert der Servoschädel-Schwarm den Effekt dieser Fähigkeit und erzeugt um den Effekt herum einen weiteren Wirkungsbereich. Überlappen beide Bereich, wird der Effekt nicht gestapelt.
languages.original_text: Whenever Pasqal uses {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Machine Spirit Communion{/g}, the servo-skull swarm mimics the effect of this ability, creating a second area centred around it. If the areas overlap, the effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Setzt Pasqal {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Maschinengeist-Kommunion{/g} ein, imitiert der Servoschädel-Schwarm den Effekt dieser Fähigkeit und erzeugt um den Effekt herum einen weiteren Wirkungsbereich. Überlappen beide Bereich, wird der Effekt nicht gestapelt.
